title: test failures with Go 1.15

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

milestone.title: v1.9.0
milestone.description: This release adds the advanced folder option `caseSensitiveFS` (https://docs.syncthing.net/advanced/folder-caseSensitiveFS.html) to disable the new safe handling of case insensitive filesystems.

body:
# Steps
1. Start at Syncthing source folder, with below software setup
2. Run `go run build.go -no-upgrade test`
3. Wait a few minutes

# Result

(`$GOPATH` environment variable name substituted for actual path)

# Expectation
All tests should complete successfully, as they do with Go 1.14.7.

# Software setup
- Syncthing version: v1.8.0, from the source release
- Go version: 1.15
- OS: Chakra Linux (Arch-like)
